import React from 'react'; import AddressForm from './AddressForm.js'; import { MDBListGroup, MDBListGroupItem, MDBRow, MDBContainer, MDBInput, MDBCol, MDBFormInline, MDBIcon, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; import DropFile from './DropFile.js'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import '../Styles/BecomeHost.css'; export class BecomeHost extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phone: 0, street:'', city:'', zip:0, state:'', length: 0, width:0, height:0, spaceDescription:'', spaceType: '', spaceImages:[] } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.handleOnDrop = this.handleOnDrop.bind(this); } handleChange(event, type){ console.log("Type: " + type); console.log("value: " + event.target.value); this.setState({ [type]:event.target.value }); } handleOnDrop = (acceptedFiles) => { console.log(acceptedFiles); let arrImages =this.state.spaceImages; for(var i=0;i this.handleClick({index})} id={index}>{image.name} ); const maxSize = 1048576; return(

Tell Us About Your Space

1. Contact Info *

 this.handleChange(event, 'firstName')} label="First" group type="text" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'lastName')} label="Last" group type="text" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'email')} label="Email" group type="email" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'phone')} label="Phone" group type="tel" validate required /> {/*Where is it*/}

2. Space Location *

3. Space Details *

 Type of space this.handleChange(event, 'spaceType')}> this.handleChange(event, 'length')} label="length (ft)" group type="number" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'width')} label="width (ft)" group type="number" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'height')} label="height (ft)" group type="number" validate required />

Pictures of the Space

 {uploadedImages}

4. Describe your space

 this.handleChange(event, 'spaceDescription')} type="textarea" label="ex: My space is oddly shaped, has AC,..." rows="5" cols="100"/> Submit
); } } export default BecomeHost;
